p: 3T3-L1 preadipocytes were seeded at a density of 10 × 10 3 cells/well for 24 h. Then, cells were incubated with PRE, infusions, decoctions or 1% Triton X-100 (Sigma-Aldrich, St-Louis, MO, USA) for 24 h. After treatment, the supernatant was collected and LDH assay was performed according to the supplier’s instructions (Abcam, Cambridge, UK).
